report.title: List plot groups in project not linked to plot.
report.description: List plots for a project, not already link to a plot.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_termlists_terms ctt JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav on ttav.termlists_term_id = ctt.id AND ttav.int_value = #recording_group_id# AND ttav.termlists_term_attribute_id = #plot_group_project_termlists_term_attr_id# AND ttav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id = #plot_id# AND lav.int_value = ctt.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #plot_group_location_attr_id# AND lav.deleted=false WHERE ctt.termlist_id = #plot_groups_termlist_id# AND lav.id IS NULL

param.name: plot_id
param.description: Id of the plot we are currently editing

param.name: plot_group_project_termlists_term_attr_id
param.display: Plot group termlists term attr id
param.description: The id of the termlists term attribute that holds the project for a plot group.

param.name: plot_group_location_attr_id
param.description: The id of the location attribute that holds the plot groups for a plot.

param.name: recording_group_id
param.description: Recording group ID of current project.

param.name: plot_location_type_id
param.description: Location type ID of a plot.
